statements: UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 10.5 WHERE transaction_id = '4b030080-5a1d-4b05-b9ae-9bcdd4a7bdd4';

UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET receiver_wallet_address = '0x5B38Da6a701c568545dCfcB03FcB875f56beddC4', transaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE sender_wallet_address = '0xC3DdA2f19C6df3Ea22b6ef60768Fa4ABC4f0Bf1c';
